title: Arch Linux’s October 2023 ISO Release Brings Linux 6.5, Installer Improvements
description:
Arch Linux 2023.10.01 is now available for download as Arch Linux's ISO release for October 2023 powered by Linux kernel 6.5 and featuring an improved installation experience.

The post Arch Linux’s October 2023 ISO Release Brings Linux 6.5, Installer Improvements appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
